Reviews.Title: Working as Expected
Reviews.Author: Tere
Reviews.Content: I bought this product recently and is working as expected. It was easy to install and very affordable. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Smoke wireless
Reviews.Author: 123abc456
Reviews.Content: These smoke sensors have helped to protect other areas that don't normally get detectors..  I used them to protect Shop and garge.  Works great.

ProductInfo.Features:
Add-on wireless smoke sensor for SecurityMan Air-Alarm system
Wireless Transmitting Distance: ¿300ft (in open area)
Operating power: 9V alkaline battery
Battery service life: ¿ 2 years
Monitoring range: 20m2
ProductInfo.Name: SecurityMan SM93 Wireless Smoke Detector for Air-Alarm1 and Air-AlarmII - Silver
